snippet: An explosion tore through a secret meeting of one of Syria’s strongest rebel groups on Tuesday, killing a dozen of its top leaders, including its head, Hassan Abboud.
lead_paragraph: An explosion tore through a secret meeting of one of Syria’s strongest rebel groups on Tuesday, killing a dozen of its top leaders, including its head, Hassan Abboud.

headline.main: Syria: Blast Decimates Leadership of Rebel Group
headline.print_headline: Syria: Blast Decimates Leadership of Rebel Group
